** navigation
SOCIAL DATA SCIENCE SEMESTER (SDS) and Management at Aalborg University offers a new option for the 3rd semester of their master’s programmes, the Social Data Science specialization semester (SDS). Immerse yourself into the increasingly relevant and fast-emerging sector of data analytics, starting September 2018. Through this programme, you will learn cutting-edge, requisite skills in, practical terms, and be able to apply them to real-world issues in various fields. Data continues to grow exponentially. From Social media posts, sensor signals on smartphones, smart home devices to the increasing digitisation of companies and public organisations, data has seen unprecedented granularity.
**

title: M1 Warmup
content: Data Science in Business  Data Science in business I - Current state [Video](https://cbs.cloud.panopto.eu/Panopto/Pages/Viewer.aspx?id=dc8a48b8-4431-4589-ab4d-ac2300c433f6& fbclid=IwAR0QUrP9x8dc02a_RdjVC3PRAzfmkv7VLdS0_g0n6q2hBrD21gEnEgH6-JM)     Data Science in business II - Introduction to Machine Learning Video Data Science in business III - Team & Roles Video Data Science in business I-III Slides

title: Applied Data Science and Machine Learning
content: M1 - Applied Data Science and Machine Learning This module will prove a condensed introduction to the “Data Science Pipeline”, introducing students to methods, techniques, and workflows in applied data analytics and machine learning, including data acquisition, preparation, analysis, visualization, and communication.
